I think we should make the frosting a more eye-catching color......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Mhmm...... Should we add this, then!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Let‚Äôs do it! It‚Äôll be red velvet frosting!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>......Before we do that, should we give it a little taste test?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Taste testing is a privilege of being a chef~ Don‚Äôt mind if I do!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
